data.prompt:
Magic: The Gathering card art.

A massive, volcanic island-world floats amidst a vibrant cosmic nebula, its core erupting in a catastrophic release of raw, glowing red and orange mana that tears the land apart. Jagged cracks spread across the island, spewing arcs of brilliant, tribal-patterned energy into the star-swept void, as a tiny outrigger starship attempts a desperate escape from the devastating cosmic surge.

Artist Credit: inspired by Tyler Jacobson

Style: Fantasy illustration, detailed, painterly, dramatic lighting.
Do NOT include any text, card frames, or UI elements.
Focus on the subject matter only.
